Package com.comp2042.logic

package com.comp2042.logic
This package contains classes that implement the game logic for the game.

This package includes:

  • BrickRotator – handles logic for bricks
  • MatrixOperations – provides functions for manipulating the game matrices.
  • SimpleBoard – is the implementation of Board and handles the board and movement logics.
  • Timer – acts as the game's timer

Classes in this package are primarily used by controllers and the game engine to manage game mechanics, piece movements, and scoring.

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BrickRotator
    This class handles the shape rotation of the active bricks.
    MatrixOperations
    This class is used in manipulating the matrix operations.
    SimpleBoard
    This class represents the game board.
    Timer
    Manages a countdown timer for timed game modes.
